rukus.text: So I swear by what you see
and what you do not see
that it (Quran) is certainly a noble messengerâ€™s word
and it is not word of a poet. A few of you believe (or you believe a little)
And it is not word of a fortune-teller (or a priest). You take a little notice
A sending down from the Master of Human kind
And if he had made up some saying (and attributed them) to Us
We would have certainly taken him by the right hand
then We would have cut off his main artery
and none of you could have kept it away from him
And certainly it (Quran) is certainly a reminder for those who control themselves
And We certainly know that some of you are deniers
And it is certainly (cause of) a regret for the disbelievers
And it is certainly the sure truth
So glorify the name of your great Master
